Posts.Content: mmcp wrote: I'm having some leaking under my bandages at the site of the drain tube, 5 days post op.  Is this normal? Margie dx July 4/07 at age 32 Stage 3C - Neoadjuvant Chemo ER+/PR+/HER2+ FEC-D chemo, bilateral mast., rads, tamoxifen(5 yrs) & Herceptin(1yr) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Drains question mmcp bean4865

Posts.Content: Oct 11, 2007 04:59PM mmcp wrote: It's a very personal decision.  For me, if I didn't do the chemo & had a reoccurance I would never forgive myself.  That's just my take, it has to be what you feel comfortable with.  Chemo sucks but it's not forever.
Posts.Title: Do you think an 8% risk of recurrance is worth doing chemo? kathyv riverinerabbit
